main event: An observer reported seeing an oval-shaped UFO over Arroyo Seco, California on September 7, 1966.
interesting points: The object was estimated to travel at a speed of 424 miles per second., The observer noted that the object hovered silently about 100 yards away., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object appeared as a white light and grew as it moved away., The observer stated they had witnessed similar phenomena before.
witness description: The witness was a 12-year-old male who previously saw similar objects.
